featured_events.name: Robotics Workshop
featured_events.description: Hands-on workshop on building autonomous robots and automation systems using Arduino and sensors. Participants learned fundamental robotics design principles and practical implementation.

featured_events.name: Line Follower Robot Competition
featured_events.description: A fun, competitive event where participants design and build autonomous line-following robots to test their precision and speed.

mega_events.name: National Robotics Challenge 2025
mega_events.description: A nationwide robotics competition hosted by IEEE NSU RAS SBC, featuring teams from universities across Bangladesh showcasing advanced autonomous robots.
